card.name: Hitmonlee

card.name: Lickitung

card.name: Rhydon

card.text: Sacrifice Lapras: Each opponent sacrifices a Pokémon. When Lapras dies, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Ditto
card.text: {3}: Ditto becomes a copy of target permanent, except its name is Ditto.

card.name: Eevee
card.text: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to evolve Pokémon. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost by more than one mana.

card.name: Vaporeon
card.text: Evolve From Eevee {3}{U} Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, scry 1 and draw a card.

card.name: Flareon

card.name: Porygon
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Porygon becomes that spell's colors. Porygon has lifelink as long as it's white. The same is true for hexproof and blue, wither and black, menace and red, and reach and green.

card.name: Omanyte
card.text: {1}{U}{U}: Copy target instant spell with mana value 2 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy. Fossil—{2}{U}{R}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Omastar
card.text: Evolve From Omanyte {U}{R} {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Omastar deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Kabuto
card.text: {1}{U}{U}: Scry 2. Fossil—{2}{G}{U}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Kabutops
card.text: Evolve From Kabuto {G}{U} {1}{G}{G}, {T}: Kabutops fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Aerodactyl
card.text: Flying, haste Fossil—{2}{R}{G}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Snorlax
card.text: Snorlax enters the battlefield tapped. Snorlax doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you gain life, untap Snorlax.

card.name: Articuno
card.text: Flying Articuno can't attack or block unless it's obedient. Tap 4 other untapped nonland permanents you control: Articuno becomes obedient.

card.name: Zapdos
card.text: Flying Zapdos can't attack or block unless it's obedient. Whenever you attack with three or more Pokémon, Zapdos becomes obedient.

card.name: Moltres
card.text: Flying Moltres can't attack or block unless it's obedient. As long as you have no cards in hand, Moltres is obedient.

card.name: Dratini
card.text: Whenever Dratini becomes the target of a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on it and you gain 2 life. {R}{G}{W}: Evolve

card.name: Dragonair (DFC)
card.text: Whenever Dragonair becomes the target of a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on it and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Dragonair
card.text: Evolve From Dratini {R}{G}{W} Spells your opponents cast that target Pokémon you control cost {X} more to cast, where X is one plus the number of times Dragonair has evolved.

card.name: Dragonite
Mewtwo
card.text: When Mewtwo enters the battlefield, create a token copy of each Pokémon you don't control, except they're 2/2 Clones. When Mewtwo dies, return it to the battlfield transformed.

card.name: Mewtwo, Redeemed
card.text: Flying Each other Pokémon you control gets +2/+2 if it shares a color with a Pokémon an opponent controls.

card.name: Mew
Red
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way. [−3]: Create Red's Pikachu, a legendary 4/4 red and white Electric Pokémon token with first strike, lifelink, and haste. [−7]: You may put any number of Pokémon cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blue
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player attacked you last turn, draw a card. [+1]: If a player controls more Pokémon than you, the next Pokémon spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is equal to the difference. [-4]: Create a token copy of target Pokémon you don't control, except it has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Green
card.text: You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to evolve Pokémon. [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. [−3]: Search your library for a Pokémon card with Evolve From, reveal it, and put it into your hand. You may evolve it without paying its mana cost this turn. Then shuffle.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. Pokémon spells you cast this turn can't be countered. [+1]: Draw a card if you control a Pokémon with power 4 or greater. [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a Pokémon you control is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to that source's controller."

card.name: Misty
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, put two loyalty counters on Misty. [+1]: Draw a card. [−3]: Return another nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: [+1]: Pokémon you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. [−2]: Pokémon you control with first strike gain double strike until end of turn, then Pokémon you control gain first strike until end of turn. [−4]: Untap all Pokémon you control that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 green Grass Poison Pokémon token with lifelink named Oddish. [-1]: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. [−4]: Pokémon you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target Pokémon gets +2/+0 and gains wither until end of turn. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have '{B}: This Pokémon can't be blocked this turn.'"

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top card of each opponent's library. Then scry 1. [-3]: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card second from the top. [-8]: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. [-2]: Blaine deals damage to target Pokémon equal to the number of Mountains you control. [-3]: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. [-2]: Each player sacrifices a Pokémon or trainer. [-6]: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Professor Oak
card.text: [+1]: Choose a Pokémon. Until your next turn, whenever that Pokémon attacks, draw a card. [-3]: Exile target Pokémon with power 4 or greater. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have indestructible."

card.name: Lorelei
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a loyalty counter on Lorelei. [0]: Tap or untap up to one target Pokémon. You gain 1 life. [-3]: Put three stun counters on target permanent.

card.name: Bruno
card.text: Whenever you attack, put a loyalty counter on Bruno. [-1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. [-2]: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Agatha
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon with a soulbind counter on it dies, exile it. Create a token copy of it, except it's a Ghost. [+1]: Put a soulbind counter on up to one target nontoken Pokémon. [-2]: You may sacrifice a nontoken Pokémon. If you do, draw two cards.

card.name: Lance (PKTO)
card.text: [+1]: Lance deals 3 damage to up to one target Pokémon. You gain 3 life. [-3]: Until end of turn, Lance becomes a 6/6 Dragon Pokémon with flying, vigilance, and indestructible. [-8]: Gain control of all Pokémon.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Poké Ball
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way.

card.name: Great Ball
card.text: Scry 3, then you may reveal the top card of library. If a Pokémon card is revealed this way, put it into your hand.

card.name: Safari Ball
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to one Pokémon card with mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Ultra Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with mana value lesser than or equal to the highest mana value among Pokémon target opponent controls. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Choose target Pokémon you control. Reveal a Pokémon card with equal or lesser mana value from your hand. If you do, return the chosen Pokémon to your hand and put the revealed card onto the battlefield.

card.name: Poké Flute
card.text: Untap all Pokémon you control. Pokémon untapped this way get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Old Rod
card.text: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card with mana value X or less and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles. X can't be greater than 3.

card.name: Revive (PKTO)
card.text: Return target Pokémon card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return target Pokémon card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Fossil: Search your library and/or graveyard for a Pokémon card with fossil and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle. Activate only during your turn.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Show of Force
card.text: Show of Force deals 1 damage to each Pokémon without flying. Draw a card.

card.name: Investigate
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Target Pokémon you control gains indestructible until end of turn. Prevent all damage that Pokémon would deal this turn. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Lemonade
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. That Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Growth
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: X Attack
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: X Defense
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +0/+4 until end of turn. Untap it. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each Pokémon that was blocked by that Pokémon this turn and put a stun counter on them.

card.name: Guard Spec.
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Target Pokémon you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Remove all counters from it. You gain life equal to twice the number of counters removed this way.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.text: Destroy target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Dowsing Machine
card.text: {T}, Put a charge counter on Dowsing Machine: Scry 1. {2}, {T}, Put a charge counter on Dowsing Machine: Draw a card. When there are four or more charge counters on Dowsing Machine, sacrifice it.

card.name: Body Slam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that Pokémon's controller instead.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Slash deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Whirlwind (PKTO)
card.text: Return target Pokémon or trainer to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sing
card.text: Tap all Pokémon target player controls. Those Pokémon don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Swift
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard. That player can't cast spells with the same name as that spell until the end of their next turn.

card.name: Ember
card.text: Ember deals 2 damage to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Gust
card.text: Gust deals 2 damage to target attacking Pokémon. If that Pokémon has flying, Gust deals 6 damage instead.

card.name: Slam
card.text: Destroy target tapped Pokémon.

card.name: Poison Sting
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pokémon. Draw a card.

card.name: Glare
card.text: Target Pokémon can't block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Flash (PKTO)
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Night Shade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack Pokémon.

card.name: Aurora Beam
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

card.name: Tackle
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking Pokémon.

card.name: Toxic
card.text: All Pokémon get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Blizzard (PKTO)
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all Pokémon.

card.name: Reflect
card.text: Counter target non-Pokémon spell.

card.name: Fire Blast
card.text: This spell can't be countered as long as you control a Fire Pokémon. Fire Blast deals 5 damage to target Pokémon. Overload {2}{R}{R}, Reveal a red Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Solar Beam
card.text: This spell costs {G} less to cast as long as you control a Grass Pokémon. Destroy target artifact, target enchantment, target trainer, or target token. Overload {2}{G}{G}, Reveal a green Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Hydro Pump
card.text: This spell has flash as long as you control a Water Pokémon. The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on the top or bottom of their library. Overload {2}{U}{U}, Reveal a blue Pokémon card from your hand.

card.name: Release
card.text: Counter target Pokémon spell.

card.name: Vine Whip
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Guillotine
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target Pokémon or trainer loses indestructible until end of turn. Destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Substitute
card.text: Choose one — • Target Pokémon you control gains hexproof from the color of your choice until end of turn. • Target attacking Pokémon becomes blocked.

card.name: Pilfer
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Mirror Move
card.text: Copy target instant spell, sorcery spell, or activated ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Double Kick
card.text: Choose target Pokémon you control. It fights target Pokémon you don't control, then fights target Pokémon you don't control.

card.name: Prepare for Trouble
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Razor Leaf
card.text: Target Pokémon you control deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you don't control has flying, destroy it instead.

card.name: Water Gun
card.text: Counter target spell with mana value X.

card.name: Petal Dance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all permanents you control.

card.name: Dig
card.text: Create two 2/1 red Ground Pokémon tokens named Diglett.

card.name: Skull Bash
card.text: Target player discards two cards. Pokémon you control gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Psychic
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. Its controller discards a card at random.

card.name: Thunder Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, you gain 1 life. Sacrifice Thunder Stone: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, untap target land. Sacrifice Leaf Stone: Add {G}{G}.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, target Pokémon gets -2/-0 until your next turn. Sacrifice Water Stone: Scry 3.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, Fire Stone deals 1 damage to target player. Sacrifice Fire Stone: It deals 2 damage to target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Moon Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. Whenver a Pokémon you control evolves, reveal the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard. Sacrifice Moon Stone: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Ancient Slab
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Pokémon Storage System
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Pokémon Storage System to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Town Map
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Super Repel
card.text: Pokémon can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each Pokémon they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Nugget
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nugget: Add one mana of any color. When Nugget is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mysterious Feather
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Feather: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Rage
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks, it deals 3 damage to target Pokémon. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Rage unless a Pokémon died this turn.

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks, tap target permanent and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon without an Evolve ability Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Destroy target nonland permanent, then put a stun counter on this Pokémon. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Swords Dance
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this Pokémon. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Swords Dance."

card.name: Mega Kick
card.text: Flash Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Dream Eater (PKTO)
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Frozen
card.text: Enchant Pokémon you don't control When Frozen enters the battlefield, tap enchanted Pokémon. Enchanted Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Pewter Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.

card.name: Cerulean Gym
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card. If a spell is not countered this way, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Vermillion Gym
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon you control attacks, put a charge counter on Vermillion Gym. Remove three charge counters from Vermillion Gym: Put a first strike, vigilance, or haste counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Celadon Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control have reach and "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Saffron Gym
card.text: When Saffron Gym enters the battlefield, draw a card. If you would draw a card, scry 1 and draw a card instead.

card.name: Fuchsia Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control have wither. If one or more -1/-1 counters would be put on a Pokémon you don't control, that many plus one -1/-1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Cinnabar Gym
card.text: Whenever you attack, choose odd or even, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card with mana value of the chosen quality, exile it. You may cast cards exiled with Cinnabar Gym.

card.name: Viridian Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control have deathtouch. Whenever a Pokémon an opponent controls dies, that player may have you create a Treasure token. If they don't, they lose 2 life.

card.name: Bill's Grassland
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Grassland. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Grassland: Add {W} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Volcano
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Volcano. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Volcano: Add {R} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Rainforest
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Rainforest. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Rainforest: Add {G} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Marsh. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Marsh: Add {B} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Bill's Coastline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Coastline. {T}, Remove all storage counters from Bill's Coastline: Add {U} for each storage counter removed this way.

card.name: Celadon City
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Cerulean Cave
card.text: Cerulean Cave enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Cerulean City
card.text: Cerulean City enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Cinnabar Island
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Cinnabar Lab
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Pallet Town

card.name: Pewter Museum
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. You lose 1 life. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Pewter Museum: Draw a card.

card.name: Pokémon Mansion
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. {4}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Power Plant
card.text: Power Plant enters the battlefield tapped unless you pay 2 life. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.text: {T}: Add {B} or {U}. You lose 1 life. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Saffron City: Draw a card.
